7800	//CLA
7400	//CLE
2010	//LDA
F020	//ADDf  IT IS LIKE a=a&b=0
0004	//output=5
7800	//CLA
7400	//CLE
2011	//LDA
F020	//ADDf   
0010	//output=7C11

7400	//CLE
2004	//LDA
F020	//ADDf
0009	//output=0014
7001	//HLT
